channel.title: Apostle's day abilities are labeled incorrectly
channel.description: So if you click Telepathy as Apostle, it does force vote but if you click force vote, it does telepathy. Really big bug here

So if you click Telepathy as Apostle, it does force vote but if you click force vote, it does telepathy. Really big bug here
